title: Did God exist before people? Jordan Peterson Matt Dillahunty Don Hoffman
description:
Jordan Peterson's answer about God reveals his knowledge of the relationship between consciousness and matter. Materialists struggle to understand what he's talking about. 

Don Hoffman's work on the world we perceive as an interface for a deeper substrate. 

JBP and Dillahunty Conversation https://youtu.be/FmH7JUeVQb8

Don Hoffman Ted Talk https://youtu.be/oYp5XuGYqqY 

Robert Wright and Don Hoffman https://youtu.be/0RBEWShMZYo 

Delayed Choice Quantum Experiment https://youtu.be/H6HLjpj4Nt4 

https://www.patreon.com/paulvanderklay
